OHLCV historical depth is subject to plan restrictions.

get.description:
Returns NFT collection metadata, supply stats, owner count, and transfer history.

The `spam_status` flag indicates if the NFT is likely spam. If status shows `pending`, retry in a few seconds.

Spam detection is supported for:

* mainnet
* base

quantity.description: Number of tokens held by this address

unique_tokens.description: Number of unique token IDs held by this address

percentage.description: Percentage of total supply held by this address

Use `skip_endpoints` to bypass endpoint responses checks.
